title: Get the authorization status of a TikTok post

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok post. To obtain the public posts of a TikTok account, use /business/video/list/ . Example: 7123456789123456789 . Note : If the TikTok post doesn't have an authorization code, either because the code is not generated or is deleted, an error will occur.
